name: UNSTAGED_DISORDER
prompt_base: 4:23PM burnt-yellow side light from low sun. Overexposed sky. Color cast slightly green. Harsh flash fired by accident. Feels chaotic but honest. Back exit of a local laundry shop â€” plastic basket on ground, open detergent box, air duct pipe running low. Hand-painted signage partially torn. Female model (Filipino-Chinese, 26), crouching by laundry cart, one shoelace untied, face half-cut by frame. Looking down, shadow of metal rack falling on face diagonally. 1 hero item (mint green cropped tee) 2 supporting: rust-orange parachute pants + mismatched canvas sneakers Laundry basket half out of frame, detergent spilled, flash reflection on tiled floor (1/250s), clothing tag visible in unexpected spot Shape: Boxy, slightly off-center shoulder seam Material: Lightwashed cotton with unfinished hem Key Feature: One stitched label purposely upside-down
negative_prompt: No perfection, no retouching, no cinematic light, no studio, no centered subject, no matching outfit, no clean logos.
